comment.text: Works

I think this update breaks the building of Silverblue ostrees: https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2177912 . It did not have the silverblue tests run on it automatically as it's not in the workstation critpath on F38 (it is on Rawhide), which I should look into and fix, but I triggered the tests manually on staging and ostree build failed as described in that bug:

https://openqa.stg.fedoraproject.org/tests/2659828#step/_ostree_build/41

I'm doing the same on prod now to confirm.
This did break ostree composes, but got pushed stable anyway. Sigh. I'll send a fix separately.
https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2023-a433b7cf46 fixes ostree composes.

https://fedorapeople.org/groups/schedule/f-35/f-35-key-tasks.html

If this Change is complete enough to be tested, please indicate this by setting this bug to the MODIFIED status. (If it is 100% complete, you can set it to ON_QA).

Leaving ON_QA for tracking purposes.

comment.text: Works

I think this update breaks the building of Silverblue ostrees: https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2177912 . It did not have the silverblue tests run on it automatically as it's not in the workstation critpath on F38 (it is on Rawhide), which I should look into and fix, but I triggered the tests manually on staging and ostree build failed as described in that bug:

https://openqa.stg.fedoraproject.org/tests/2659828#step/_ostree_build/41

I'm doing the same on prod now to confirm.
This did break ostree composes, but got pushed stable anyway. Sigh. I'll send a fix separately.
https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2023-a433b7cf46 fixes ostree composes.

Use the following template to for the 'fedpkg update' request to submit an
update for this issue as it contains the top-level parent bug(s) as well as
this tracking bug.  This will ensure that all associated bugs get updated
when new packages are pushed to stable.

=====

# bugfix, security, enhancement, newpackage (required)
type=security

# low, medium, high, urgent (required)
severity=high

# testing, stable
request=testing

# Bug numbers: 1234,9876
bugs=2176494,2176495,2176496,2176497,2176498,2176499,2176500,2176501,2176502,2176503,2176504,2176505,2176506,2176507,2176508,2176509,2176511,2176512,2176513,2176514,2176515,2176516,2176517,2176518,2176519

# Description of your update
notes=Security fix for [PUT CVEs HERE]

# Enable request automation based on the stable/unstable karma thresholds
autokarma=True
stable_karma=3
unstable_karma=-3

# Automatically close bugs when this marked as stable
close_bugs=True

# Suggest that users restart after update
suggest_reboot=False

comment.text:
I think this update breaks the building of Silverblue ostrees: https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2177912 . It did not have the silverblue tests run on it automatically as it's not in the workstation critpath on F38 (it is on Rawhide), which I should look into and fix, but I triggered the tests manually on staging and ostree build failed as described in that bug:

https://openqa.stg.fedoraproject.org/tests/2659828#step/_ostree_build/41

I'm doing the same on prod now to confirm.
This did break ostree composes, but got pushed stable anyway. Sigh. I'll send a fix separately.
https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2023-a433b7cf46 fixes ostree composes.

comment.text: Works

I think this update breaks the building of Silverblue ostrees: https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2177912 . It did not have the silverblue tests run on it automatically as it's not in the workstation critpath on F38 (it is on Rawhide), which I should look into and fix, but I triggered the tests manually on staging and ostree build failed as described in that bug:

https://openqa.stg.fedoraproject.org/tests/2659828#step/_ostree_build/41

I'm doing the same on prod now to confirm.
This did break ostree composes, but got pushed stable anyway. Sigh. I'll send a fix separately.
https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2023-a433b7cf46 fixes ostree composes.
